Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters of each volumetric particle quality level.

fogShadowEnabled.Wiki: If ON, enable volumetric fog shadows.

fogVolumeEdgeCorrectionLevel.Wiki: The fog edge correction level used during bilateral upscaling.

fogVolumeResolution.Wiki: The processing resolution of placeable fog volumes. (Overrides upscale type setting).

fogShadowSampleCountBias.Wiki: The offset to apply to the fog shadow sample count.

fogLocalLightDistScale.Wiki: The local light calculation distance scale within volumetric fog (0 does not calculate local light).

fogVolueSizeScaler.Wiki: The size scalar to apply to volumetric fog.

fogVolueSizeDivider.Wiki: The size divisor to apply to volumetric fog.

fogVolumeDepthScaler.Wiki: The depth scalar to apply to volumetric fog.

fogVolumeDepthDivider.Wiki: The depth divisor to apply to volumetric fog.

fogVolumeEnabled.Wiki: If ON, placeable fog volumes are enabled.

fogVolumeUpScaleType.Wiki: The type of upscaling to apply to the fog.

fogVolumeUpScaleInTwoStageEnabled.Wiki: Upscaling from the reduced buffer will be increased from 1 to 2 stages to reduce flickering.

fogVolumeShadowEnabled.Wiki: If ON, enables shadows related to the fog volume.

fogVolumeRayMarcingSampleCountOffset.AltName: Fog Volume Ray Sample Count Offset
fogVolumeRayMarcingSampleCountOffset.Wiki: The offset applied to the sampling number during ray marching for the fog volume.

fogVolumeTwoStepUpScalingEnabled.Wiki: If ON, use 2-step upscaling when applying upscaling to the fog volume.

fogVolumeForceShadowing.Wiki: If ON, forcibly casts a shadow on the area regardless of the setting when shadow is permitted (shadow processing is not affected)
